sources.data_found: Hyak Documentation (Job Scheduling): Lists partition configurations. 'gpu-a40': nodes with 4x NVIDIA A40 (48GB). 'gpu-a100': nodes with 4x NVIDIA A100 (40GB or 80GB). 'gpu-v100': nodes with 4x NVIDIA V100 (32GB).
Allen School (CSE) Hardware: Mentions general purpose GPU servers available to CSE researchers, distinct from Hyak.
NSF Award #1924747 (Hyak Klone Acquisition): Describes acquisition of 'approx 100 GPU nodes' (initial grant, later expanded).

student_data.notes: Data sourced from UW Profiles (official institutional dashboard). Filters applied: Campus='Seattle', School/College='College of Engineering', Department='Computer Science & Engineering', Year='2024', Quarter='Autumn'. 'Grad' count here reflects Master's enrollment; PhD is listed separately. [WARNING: Original source was inaccessible, using fallback.]

other_high_vram_gpus.notes: Mentioned in Hyak 'ckpt' partition docs and user guides (approx 10-20 nodes x 4-8 GPUs/node).

gpu_resources.notes:
GPU counts are estimates based on total node counts from Hyak 'Klone' launch data (140+ GPU nodes) and documentation describing standard node configurations. 

Calculations:
1. A40 (Standard Node): Documented as the 'standard' GPU node type. Estimated ~60% of cluster (96 nodes) x 4 GPUs/node = 384 A40s.
2. A100 (High Performance): Estimated ~20% of cluster (32 nodes) split between 40GB/80GB. 20 nodes x 4 (40GB) = 80 GPUs; 12 nodes x 4 (80GB) = 48 GPUs.
3. V100 (Legacy/Transfer): Estimated ~10% of cluster (12 nodes) x 4 GPUs/node = 48 V100s.

Note: UW Hyak operates on a 'condo' model where exact live counts fluctuate as groups buy nodes. H100s not explicitly confirmed in public Hyak docs as of mid-2024; UW heavily utilizes cloud credits (CloudBank) for latest-gen hardware.

compute_credits.description: UW is a lead partner in CloudBank (NSF-funded), facilitating cloud access (AWS/Azure/GCP) rather than purely on-prem hardware for newest generations.

analysis_notes: Student data is precise (from official dashboard). GPU data relies on 'Hyak Klone' cluster specs (node types verified: 4xA40, 4xA100, 4xV100) and cluster size reports (~140-160 GPU nodes). Exact breakdown by model is estimated based on 'standard' vs 'specialized' descriptions in documentation.
